alert.note: Alert for Eastern Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 1:54PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Urban area and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Including the following area, Eastern Aleutians. * WHEN...Until 1145 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. - Mudslides and debris flows are possible along steep hillsides. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 145 PM AKST, Reports indicate rises in water levels from heavy rain across the warned area. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 3 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 4.5 to 5.5 inches are possible. - Local emergency management has recommended driving only if necessary. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Eastern Aleutians zone - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
